text: SpecializedBOOST®products are classified as a formulated liquid diet.BOOST® Plus Caloriesis designed for those looking for help to maintain a healthy weight. It contains 360 calories, 27 vitamins & minerals and 14g of protein per 237ml. If a non-creamy option is something you are seeking,BOOST® Fruit Flavouredcontains 180 calories, 22 vitamins & minerals and 9g of protein per 237ml.BOOST® 2.24is our highest calorie beverage with 530 calories, 22g protein, 28 vitamins & minerals and 13g sugar per 237ml.
Find the BOOST that fits you.
Who says nutrition needs to be complicated?Keep things simple with products that work as hard as you do.
BOOST® Nutritional Drinks have the nutrients your body needs, and a taste you’ll love.
